TopicTitle: Parts attached to Infernal Robotics dont move when actuators move.

Articles.Content:
Hi this is my first post on the forum so hello. 

I am still running 1.2.2 and installed Infernal robotics today following a guide i found on here. 

 

I have got all the robotics parts moving using the servo control but for some reason what ever i attach to them stays still when i go to fly. 

 

Everything seems to work perfectly in the VAB. 

It wasnt a basic install as i had to download a few different things so maybe ive miss placed something. 

 

Any ideas? 

 

Josh

I would make sure auto struts are turned off and any other struts aren't touching as nearby struts go a stray.... and remove the KJR this mod seems too have conflicts see below:: 

Quote from Montana7585 >>

Beatiful crane !

I found the mistake :-)

I have installed the mod KJR  ( Kerbal Joint Reinforcement)

Delete KJR and it isworking great !


Thank you for your efforts
Montana

Edited May 29, 2017 by Jammer-TD

Thanks ill give it a go. 

 

Josh
There is a version of KJR available for KSP 1.22 that is compatible with Infernal; robotics , see the later pages of IR thread
